markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Oneiric Influence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3878) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 206</row>

**Archetype** [Sleepwalker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=195)

**Prerequisites**
[Infiltrate Dream](/Feats.aspx?ID=3874)

</column>

---

While Infiltrating a Dream, you can also implant a suggestion in the target's mind. The target must attempt a Will save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, to resist your modification, which has the effects of a [_subconscious suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=314) spell, but even on a critical success, the target doesn't realize you were trying to control them and may not recognize your presence in the dream. The suggestion remains in the target's subconscious for 1 week or until triggered. Their memories of carrying out the suggestion are hazy and dreamlike and they may not remember doing it unless later reminded.
name: Oneiric Influence

The target must attempt a Will save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, to resist your modification, which has the effects of a subconscious suggestion spell, but even on a critical success, the target doesn't realize you were trying to control them and may not recognize your presence in the dream. The suggestion remains in the target's subconscious for 1 week or until triggered. Their memories of carrying out the suggestion are hazy and dreamlike and they may not remember doing it unless later reminded.
